column4: hey all, this is the first time I have seen this message so I wanted to check.   The update notifier was bugging me and when I blindly went to allow it to install all updates it prompts me about "NOT AUTHENTICATED" software.  The ones it is complaining about are capplets-data, libpanel-applet2-0, gnome-control-center, libgnome-windows-settings1, gnome-panel-date, and gnome-panel.   Is this safe?
this should fix that auth error
